projects.title: Custom Programming Language
projects.description: I led the development of a new custom programming language from scratch, focusing on simplicity, expressiveness, and performance.

projects.title: Bibliotech
projects.description: As a developer in the Bibliotech project, I designed a microservices architecture with a focus on scalability as the database engine, using MongoDB, organized into three specific databases: users, books, and book rentals, optimizing data management and scalability.

projects.title: IBook
projects.description: IBook is a simple application for managing and publishing book rental records. Built with Vanilla Java and Apache Tomcat, this project integrates a public API to display available books while managing user registrations and book delivery systems.

projects.title: Meeteng
projects.description: I developed a RESTful API with Spring Boot, which allows users to schedule meetings, where participants can be added, view their availability, and send email notifications.

projects.title: React Clone
projects.description: I managed to create a clone of the React DOM tree and use useState for its use with vanilla JavaScript. I achieved correct communication between elements for their subsequent use.

projects.title: School ASP
projects.description: SchoolAsp is a web application developed in ASP.NET, focused on easing the administrative burden in educational institutions and fostering communication between students, teachers, and parents.

projects.title: Avo Stored
projects.description: Avo Stored is a web e-commerce application that I developed for selling high-quality avocados.

projects.title: Solid Credit
projects.description: Solid Credit is a powerful library that I developed for generating credit amortization tables.

projects.title: Tetris Rush
projects.description: This repository hosts my personal rendition of the classic Tetris game, implemented entirely in Vanilla JavaScript.

projects.title: Pomodoro
projects.description: Pomodoro is a cross-platform application created with React Native, which allows users to manage their time efficiently.

projects.title: Zainab Portfolio
projects.description: Zainab Portfolio is a web application I developed for a UX/UI designer.

projects.title: Cats and Dogs Classifier
projects.description: This is an image classification project; in this case, I classified images of cats and dogs using a convolutional neural network.

projects.title: Logging API
projects.description: This is a project for a logging API, created with Express and a database ORM.

projects.title: Pockedex
projects.description: Pockedex is a web application I developed for displaying information about Pokémon. It features management of the Pokémon saved in your gallery and a user registry. This application consumes data from a public external API and registers the data in an internal API developed to guarantee users' data availability and security.

projects.title: UX Designer Project
projects.description: This project is part of the MAUI course project, where the user interface of a fast food restaurant application was developed, using the application's design in Figma and developing the application in Xamarin.

blog.title: Learning Flexbox
blog.description: Flexbox is a CSS module that provides an efficient way to design complex and responsive user interfaces.

blog.title: Differences between Indexes and Views in SQL
blog.description: In SQL databases, indexes and views are essential for improving query performance and data organization.

blog.title: Techniques for Storage Optimization in SQL
blog.description: Efficient storage management in SQL databases is key for optimal performance, scalability, and cost reduction.

inDeveloper.title: API Ecommerce
inDeveloper.description: This is a Restful API project developed in Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. The API allows users to perform CRUD operations on a product database.

inDeveloper.title: API Inventory Manager
inDeveloper.description: This is a Project for an Inventory Manager, created with Express and a database ORM.

inDeveloper.title: GPTBOT
inDeveloper.description: Subsurface weight, specular roughness, diffuse maps generated with the procedure and manual techniques.

inDeveloper.title: WhatsApp bot
inDeveloper.description: Subsurface weight, specular roughness, diffuse maps generated with the procedure and manual techniques.
